about_the_game:
Strandzha Adventures 3D is an action-adventure game that allows you to embark on an epic journey to help, the Thracian warrior Catos find and rescue his fiancé Theana, who has been kidnapped in the jungles of the Strandzha Mountain.

Explore the uncharted lands, a world filled with many dangers, puzzles and secrets. Fight vicious monsters, and discover hidden treasures to help you on your quest. Use all your wits and skill to unravel the mysteries of the ancient mountain of Strandzha.

Inspired by the mythology of the ancient Thracians, you have been chosen as this mountain's warrior. Prepare yourself for an extraordinary journey in this stunning land. You will engage in a battle to awaken and unlock the mysteries of the ancient land. Explore the vast world, gather resources, outsmart monsters, and go on a mission to save your only Love, Teana.

Let the water nymph, Meda and the good Satyr be your light and guide you to look for your beloved. Follow the paths, collect coins, and beware of the dangers lurking in the darkness as you strive to become the saviour of this unknown land.

Go through various obstacles in Strandzha Mountain, collect gold coins and fight against the evil forces in your way. Visit ancient sanctuaries and oracles and meet those, that can show you the right way.

There are 18 levels available in 6 different areas of Strandzha Mountain.

★ Retro-inspired 3D graphics and gameplay of late-90s platformers.

★ Pass all levels by jumping over holes, avoiding traps and knocking down enemies.

★ The controls are simple and easy to understand for casual playing.

★ Enjoy and explore a beautiful, colourful 3D world.

★ 18 challenging levels.

★ a single-player, offline, action-adventure game with a third-person game camera.

★ Learn more about the ancient Thracians - their beliefs, gods and sanctuaries.

★ Get to know some of Bulgaria's most famous sights in the real Strandzha Mountain.

★ Discover the vast lands on Strandzha and solve intriguing puzzles as you awaken the dormant land and create new stories. Become the Mountain King and explore the beautiful yet dangerous and twisted land in your endeavour to rescue your girlfriend. Traverse a wondrous landscape and survive deadly encounters with Strandzha Adventures 3D's many hideous creatures.

With monsters and obstacles, the last thing you want to happen is to be stranded in complete darkness with the monster emerging from hiding. Use your weapons and survival skills at your disposal, construct strategies and use the tools and the environment to get through battles. Let your imagination run wild!

★ Utilize nature's resources to your advantage and overcome challenges. Stay vigilant in the face of lurking dangers. Unleash your strength to defeat the darkness and save your love, Teana.

★ Discover the vast lands to meet your allies and embark on this unforgettable adventure!

You have been chosen to be the Mountain's warrior and saviour. Prepare yourself for an extraordinary journey in this stunning game.

The classic 3D platformers for PS1 and Nintendo 64 inspired Strandzha Adventures 3D.

★ All the scenery in the game is based on real places in the mountain. Some of them are tourist landmarks nowadays.

Control Input:

★Movement: W - A - S - D
★Jump: Space
★Sword: Mouse Left Click
★Camera rotation: Mouse movement 

★Pause: Esc button

movies.name: Adventures in the mystical mountain of the ancient Thracians

name: Strandzha Adventures 3D

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GT 540M - 1 GB
  • Storage: 410 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: 16:9 aspect ratio
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 940 MX - 2 GB
  • Storage: 410 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: 16:9 aspect ratio

short_description: Fantasy 3D Platformer Game To Experience The Mystical Mountain of the Ancient Thracians. Inspired by the 3D platformer games of the late ’90s. It is an exciting experience among the amazing nature, ancient sanctuaries, and legends of the real Strandzha Mountain.
